alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 11:36PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Ada, southeastern Canyon and northwestern Owyhee Counties through 1215 AM MDT... At 1136 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kuna to near Squaw Butte. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Reynolds, Kuna, Melba and Guffey around 1150 PM MDT. Southwestern Boise and Initial Point around 1200 AM MDT. Silver City, Murphy, Swan Falls and Blacks Creek Reservoir around 1210 AM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
